## Plot using **plotly**

```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}

library(plotly)
library(rnaturalearth)

df_mexico <- ne_states(country = "Mexico", returnclass = "sf")
df_mexico$KPI <- sample(1:10,33,replace = T)

plot_ly(stroke = I("black"), span = I(1)) %>% 
  add_sf(
    data = df_mexico, 
    color = I("gray95"),
    hoverinfo = "none"
  ) %>%
  add_sf(
    data = df_mexico, 
    color = ~KPI,
    split = ~name, 
    text = ~paste(name, KPI), 
    hoverinfo = "text", 
    hoveron = "fills"
  ) %>%
  layout(showlegend = FALSE)

```
